script.name: plugin.roverview.menu
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds'
$menu.data = get global variable: name='roverview.menu.data' $search.string = get global variable: name='roverview.menu.search' $grouping.ware = get global variable: name='roverview.menu.grouping' $filter.mineral = get global variable: name='roverview.menu.mineral' $group.closed = get global variable: name='roverview.menu.closed' skip if $grouping.ware $grouping.ware = 0 skip if $filter.mineral $filter.mineral = 0
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] @ $menu.data = [THIS] -> call script plugin.roverview.compilelist : $now = playing time $menu.data['last.update'] = $now set global variable: name='roverview.menu.data' value=$menu.data set global variable: name='roverview.menu.search' value=null set global variable: name='roverview.menu.searchdetail' value=null if not $group.closed $group.closed = table alloc $table = $menu.data['factories'] if $table $key = get next key: table=$table key=null while $key $group.closed[$key] = [TRUE] $key = get next key: table=$table key=$key end end set global variable: name='roverview.menu.closed' value=$group.closed end
gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Update] $menu.id = $a.data[0] if $menu.id == 'roverview.menu' gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'roverview.menu' if $selection == 'grouping' $grouping.ware = $value set global variable: name='roverview.menu.grouping' value=$grouping.ware gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if $selection == 'mineral' $filter.mineral = $value set global variable: name='roverview.menu.mineral' value=$filter.mineral gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Hotkey] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'roverview.menu' if $selection == 'ware.info' if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_WARE $input = create input: id='ware.info' encyclopedia page, ware=$value return $input end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Search] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $search.string = $a.data[1] if $menu.id == 'roverview.menu' set global variable: name='roverview.menu.search' value=$search.string gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if $menu.id == 'roverview.details' set global variable: name='roverview.menu.searchdetail' value=$search.string gosub sub.BuildDetailsMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Group] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'roverview.menu' if $value remove key $selection from table $group.closed else $group.closed[$selection] = [TRUE] end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Context] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2]
if $menu.id == 'roverview.menu' if $value == 'info' $input = create input: id='ware.info' encyclopedia page, ware=$selection return $input else if $value == 'details' set global variable: name='roverview.menu.details' value=$selection gosub sub.BuildDetailsMenu return $input end else if $menu.id == 'roverview.details' if $value == 'info' $input = create input: id='info' object info page, object=$selection return $input end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] set global variable: name='roverview.menu.data' value=null set global variable: name='roverview.menu.details' value=null set global variable: name='roverview.menu.search' value=null set global variable: name='roverview.menu.searchdetail' value=null end return null
sub.BuildMenu: $last.update = $menu.data['last.update'] $now = playing time if ( $last.update + 20 ) > $now @ $menu.data = [THIS] -> call script plugin.roverview.compilelist : $menu.data['last.update'] = $now set global variable: name='roverview.menu.data' value=$menu.data end
$menu = create custom menu array
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9210 add tab to menu: $menu, text=$read.text
$text.columns = array alloc: size=7 $COL1 = 0 $COL2 = 250 $COL3 = 290 $COL4 = 315 $COL5 = 400 $COL6 = 445 $COL7 = 500 $COL.LEN = 100
$array.values = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3072 $array.values[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3073 $array.values[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3071 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$array.values, default=$grouping.ware, return id='grouping', width=100 allowtabs=[TRUE]
$len = $COL2 - $COL1 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=2163 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text $len = $COL3 - $COL2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102518 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[1] = $text $len = $COL4 - $COL3 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102519 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL3 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[2] = $text $len = $COL5 - $COL4 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102527 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL4 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[3] = $text $len = $COL6 - $COL5 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=683 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL5 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[4] = $text $len = $COL7 - $COL6 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102457 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL6 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[5] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9510 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COL.LEN right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[6] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.columns
$drawn.any = [FALSE]
$table.wares = $menu.data['wares'] if not $search.string $table.filtered = $table.wares else if not get length of string $search.string $table.filtered = $table.wares else $table.filtered = table alloc $key = get next key: table=$table.wares key=null while $key $text = sprintf: fmt='%s', $key, null, null, null, null if case insensitive string match, is $search.string in $text $table.filtered[$key] = [TRUE] end $key = get next key: table=$table.wares key=$key end end
if $grouping.ware == 0 $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$table.filtered gosub sub.DrawWares else if $grouping.ware == 1
$array.types = create new array, size=9, elements=[SSTYPE_LASER], [SSTYPE_MISSILE], [SSTYPE_SHIELD], [SSTYPE_W_ENERGY], [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS], [SSTYPE_W_BIO], [SSTYPE_W_FOOD], [SSTYPE_W_NATURAL] $array.types[8] = [SSTYPE_W_TECH] insert [SSTYPE_FACTORY] into array $array.types at index 0 insert [SSTYPE_DOCK] into array $array.types at index 0
$size = size of array $array.types $i = 0 while $i < $size $main.type = $array.types[$i] inc $i =
$grouped.table = table alloc $key = get next key: table=$table.filtered key=null while $key $main = get maintype of ware $key do if $main == $main.type $grouped.table[$key] = [TRUE] $key = get next key: table=$table.filtered key=$key end
if size of table $grouped.table gosub sub.GetTypeText $is.open = [TRUE] do if $group.closed[$main.type] $is.open = [FALSE] add new grouping to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, open=$is.open, id=$main.type, indent=null $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$grouped.table gosub sub.DrawWares add end grouping to menu: $menu add section to custom menu: $menu end end end
if not $drawn.any $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end
$drawn.any = [FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=2139 add tab to menu: $menu, text=$read.text
$array.minerals = array alloc: size=1 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3076 $array.minerals[0] = $read.text
$sub = get number of subtypes of maintype [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS] $i = 0 while $i < $sub $mineral = get ware from maintype [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS] and subtype $i append $mineral to array $array.minerals inc $i = end
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3075 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$array.minerals, default=$filter.mineral, return id='mineral', width=100 allowtabs=[TRUE]
$COL1 = 0 $COL2 = 250 $COL3 = 350 $COL4 = 420 $COL5 = 600 $text.columns = array alloc: size=4
$len = $COL2 - $COL1 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=2139 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text $len = $COL3 - $COL2 $read.text = read text: page=54 id=15 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[1] = $text $len = $COL4 - $COL3 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=717 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL3 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[2] = $text $len = $COL5 - $COL4 $read.text = read text: page=9620 id=141 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL4 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[3] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.columns
$table.ast = $menu.data['asteroids'] if not $search.string $table.filtered = $table.ast else if not get length of string $search.string $table.filtered = $table.ast else $table.filtered = table alloc $key = get next key: table=$table.ast key=null while $key $item.sector = $key -> get sector $text = $item.sector -> get name do if case insensitive string match, is $search.string in $text $table.filtered[$key] = [TRUE] $key = get next key: table=$table.ast key=$key end end
if not size of table $table.filtered $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text else $sorted.array = sort table keys by value: table=$table.filtered gosub sub.DrawAsteroids if not $drawn.any $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end end
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3078 add tab to menu: $menu, text=$read.text $array.production = $menu.data['production'] $table.filtered = $menu.data['factories'] $cycle.time = $array.production[0]
$COL1 = 250 $COL2 = 360 $COL3 = 480 $COL4 = 600 $COL.LEN = 120
$text.columns = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3077 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$COL1 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text $text = format time: $cycle.time $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$COL1 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.columns
$text.columns = array alloc: size=4 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9105 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$COL1 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text $len = $COL2 - $COL1 $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2013 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[1] = $text $len = $COL3 - $COL2 $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2014 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[2] = $text $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2015 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COL.LEN right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[3] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.columns
if not size of table $table.filtered $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text else $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$table.filtered gosub sub.DrawFactories if not $drawn.any $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end end
$text.columns = array alloc: size=4 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3078 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$COL1 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text $len = $COL2 - $COL1 $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2013 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[1] = $text $len = $COL3 - $COL2 $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2014 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[2] = $text $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2015 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COL.LEN right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[3] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.columns
$indent = 0 $table.products = $array.production[1] $table.resources = $array.production[2] $table.surplus = $array.production[3] $table.needed = $array.production[4] gosub sub.DrawProducts
set menu option: $menu, icon=122 set menu option: $menu, widthtype=[MenuWidth.Big] set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.Identity], id='ware.info' set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE] set menu option: $menu, remove main header=[TRUE]
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3070 $callback = [Callback.Switch] | [Callback.Group] $input = create input: id='roverview.menu', dynamic menu=$menu, title=$read.text, description=$a.obj, callback=$callback, update=2000ms endsub
sub.DrawFactories: $drawn.any = [FALSE] $sorted.size = size of array $sorted.array $sorted.i = 0 while $sorted.i < $sorted.size $sorted.item = $sorted.array[$sorted.i] inc $sorted.i =
$drawn.any = [TRUE] $text.columns = array alloc: size=2 $text = $sorted.item ->create custom menu string object icon $text = create custom menu column string, position=20 length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[0] = $text $text = $sorted.item -> get name $item.sector = $sorted.item -> get sector $text2 = $item.sector -> get name $text = sprintf: fmt='%s - %s', $text, $text2, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=30 length=250 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text if $group.closed[$sorted.item] $is.open = [FALSE] else $is.open = [TRUE] end add new grouping to menu: $menu, text=$text.columns, open=$is.open, id=$sorted.item, indent=30
$fac.production = $menu.data[$sorted.item] $cycle.time = $fac.production[0] $table.products = $fac.production[1] $table.resources = $fac.production[2] $table.surplus = $fac.production[3] $table.needed = $fac.production[4] $indent = 30 gosub sub.DrawProducts add end grouping to menu: $menu do if $is.open add section to custom menu: $menu end endsub
sub.DrawProducts: $drawn.any.sub = [FALSE] $sorted.wares = sort table keys: table=$table.products $product.count = size of array $sorted.wares $product.i = 0 while $product.i < $product.count $product = $sorted.wares[$product.i] inc $product.i =
if $search.string if get length of string $search.string $ware.name = sprintf: fmt='%s', $product, null, null, null, null skip if case insensitive string match, is $search.string in $ware.name continue end end
$drawn.any.sub = [TRUE] $text.columns = array alloc: size=4 $len = $COL1 - $indent $text = create custom menu column string, position=$indent length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$product $text.columns[0] = $text $len = $COL2 - $COL1 $text = $table.products[$product] $text = convert number $text to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text $len = $COL3 - $COL2 $text = $table.resources[$product] skip if $text $text = 0 $text = convert number $text to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[2] = $text $text = $table.surplus[$product] if not $text $text = $table.needed[$product] skip if $text $text = 0 do if $text $text = - $text end
if $text >= 0 $colour = [MenuColour.Green] else if $text < 0 $colour = [MenuColour.Red] end $text = convert number $text to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COL.LEN right=[TRUE] colour=$colour text=$text $text.columns[3] = $text
add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text.columns end
do if $drawn.any.sub add section to custom menu: $menu
$sorted.wares = sort table keys: table=$table.resources $product.count = size of array $sorted.wares $product.i = 0 while $product.i < $product.count $product = $sorted.wares[$product.i] inc $product.i = do if $table.products[$product] continue
if $search.string if get length of string $search.string $ware.name = sprintf: fmt='%s', $product, null, null, null, null skip if case insensitive string match, is $search.string in $ware.name continue end end
$drawn.any.sub = [TRUE]
$text.columns = array alloc: size=4 $len = $COL1 - $indent $text = create custom menu column string, position=$indent length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$product $text.columns[0] = $text $len = $COL2 - $COL1 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text='0' $text.columns[1] = $text $text = $table.resources[$product] $text = convert number $text to string $len = $COL3 - $COL2 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[2] = $text $text = $table.needed[$product] skip if $text $text = 0 do if $text $text = - $text $len = $COL4 - $COL3 if $text >= 0 $colour = [MenuColour.Green] else if $text < 0 $colour = [MenuColour.Red] end $text = convert number $text to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COL.LEN right=[TRUE] colour=$colour text=$text $text.columns[3] = $text
add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text.columns end
if not $drawn.any.sub $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end endsub
sub.DrawAsteroids: $drawn.any = [FALSE] $sorted.i = size of array $sorted.array while $sorted.i dec $sorted.i = $sorted.item = $sorted.array[$sorted.i]
$ast.ware = $sorted.item -> get resource waretype of asteroid
if $filter.mineral $mineral = $array.minerals[$filter.mineral] skip if $mineral == $ast.ware continue end
$text.columns = array alloc: size=5 $text = $sorted.item ->create custom menu string object icon $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[0] = $text $item.sector = $sorted.item -> get sector $len = $COL2 - $COL1 - 10 $x = $COL1 + 10 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$x length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$item.sector $text.columns[1] = $text $len = $COL3 - $COL2 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$ast.ware $text.columns[2] = $text $len = $COL4 - $COL3 $ast.yield = $sorted.item -> get asteroid yield $text = convert number $ast.yield to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL3 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[3] = $text $len = $COL5 - $COL4 if $sorted.item ->can see hidden wares (Asteroids) $hidden.wares = $sorted.item ->get asteroid hidden wares table if $hidden.wares skip if size of table $hidden.wares $hidden.wares = null end if $hidden.wares $hidden.wares = sort table keys: table=$hidden.wares $text = combine string array: $hidden.wares, separator=', ' $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL4 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Green] text=$text else $text = read text: page=$page.id id=3080 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL4 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Red] text=$text end else $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3079 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL4 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Grey] text=$read.text end $text.columns[4] = $text
$drawn.any = [TRUE] $ret = create menu return value: object context menu, object=$sorted.item add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.columns returnvalue=$ret end endsub
sub.DrawWares: $sorted.size = size of array $sorted.array $sorted.i = 0 while $sorted.i < $sorted.size $sorted.item = $sorted.array[$sorted.i]
set discovered status: type=$sorted.item status=[TRUE]
$text.columns = array alloc: size=7 $len = $COL2 - $COL1 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$sorted.item $text.columns[0] = $text $len = $COL3 - $COL2 $text = get volume of ware $sorted.item $text = convert number $text to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text $len = $COL4 - $COL3 $text = get transport class of ware $sorted.item $text = get short transport class name: class=$text $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL3 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[2] = $text $len = $COL5 - $COL4 $table = $menu.data['wares'] $ware.qty = $table[$sorted.item] $text = convert number $ware.qty to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL4 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[3] = $text $len = $COL6 - $COL5 $table = $menu.data['ship.count'] $text = $table[$sorted.item] skip if $text $text = 0 $text = convert number $text to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL5 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[4] = $text $len = $COL7 - $COL6 $table = $menu.data['station.count'] $text = $table[$sorted.item] skip if $text $text = 0
$text = convert number $text to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL6 length=$len right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[5] = $text $text = get average price of ware $sorted.item $text = convert number $text to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s %s', $text, [Text.Credits], null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COL.LEN right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[6] = $text
$context.menu = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Encyclopedia] id=76 add context menu entry: menu=$context.menu, text=$read.text, icon=29, returnvalue='info', hotkey=[Key.Identity], disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.QMenus] id=60301 add context menu entry: menu=$context.menu, text=$read.text, icon=20, returnvalue='details', hotkey=[Key.Details], disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=818 add context menu global info line: menu=$context.menu, name=$read.text, value=$sorted.item $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102527 $text = convert number $ware.qty to string add context menu global info line: menu=$context.menu, name=$read.text, value=$text $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id=$sorted.item, menu=$context.menu, dynamic=[FALSE] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.columns returnvalue=$ret $drawn.any = [TRUE] inc $sorted.i = end endsub
sub.GetTypeText: if $main.type == [SSTYPE_LASER] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=11 else if $main.type == [SSTYPE_W_ENERGY] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=14 else if $main.type == [SSTYPE_SHIELD] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=13 else if $main.type == [SSTYPE_MISSILE] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=12 else if $main.type == [SSTYPE_W_BIO] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=8 else if $main.type == [SSTYPE_W_FOOD] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=9 else if $main.type == [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=15 else if $main.type == [SSTYPE_W_NATURAL] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=10 else if $main.type == [SSTYPE_W_TECH] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=16 else if $main.type == [SSTYPE_FACTORY] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=822 else if $main.type == [SSTYPE_DOCK] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=823 end endsub
sub.BuildDetailsMenu: $details.ware = get global variable: name='roverview.menu.details' $search.string = get global variable: name='roverview.menu.searchdetail'
$menu = create custom menu array
$table = $menu.data['ware.objs'] $table = $table[$details.ware] if not $search.string $table.filtered = $table else if not get length of string $search.string $table.filtered = $table else $table.filtered = table alloc $key = get next key: table=$table key=null while $key $text = $key -> get name do if case insensitive string match, is $search.string in $text $table.filtered[$key] = [TRUE] $key = get next key: table=$table key=$key end end
$COL1 = 15 $COL2 = 250 $COL3 = 450 $COL.LEN = 120
$text.columns = array alloc: size=3
$len = $COL2 - $COL1 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3074 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $len = $COL3 - $COL2 $text.columns[0] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102530 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[1] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102527 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COL.LEN right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[2] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.columns
$filter.class = Station gosub sub.DrawDetails $filter.class = Ship gosub sub.DrawDetails
$COL1 = 0 $COL2 = 150
add info line heading to menu: $menu, heading=$details.ware $text.columns = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9316 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$COL2 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text $text = get volume of ware $details.ware $text = convert number $text to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.columns
$text.columns = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104408 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$COL2 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text $text = get transport class of ware $details.ware $text = get short transport class name: class=$text $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.columns
$text.columns = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Encyclopedia] id=22 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=$COL2 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text $text = get average price of ware $details.ware $text = convert number $text to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s %s', $text, [Text.Credits], null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.columns
set menu option: $menu, icon=122 set menu option: $menu, widthtype=[MenuWidth.Big] set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE]
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3070 $input = create input: id='roverview.details' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$details.ware callback=null endsub
sub.DrawDetails: $drawn.any = [FALSE] $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$table.filtered
$sorted.size = size of array $sorted.array $sorted.i = 0 while $sorted.i < $sorted.size $sorted.item = $sorted.array[$sorted.i] inc $sorted.i =
skip if $sorted.item -> is of class $filter.class continue
if not $drawn.any $drawn.any = [TRUE] add new grouping to menu: $menu, text=$filter.class, open=[TRUE], id=$filter.class, indent=null end
$text.columns = array alloc: size=5 $text = $sorted.item ->create custom menu string object icon $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL1 length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[0] = $text $len = $COL2 - $COL1 - 10 $x = $COL1 + 10 $text = $sorted.item -> get name $text = create custom menu column string, position=$x length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text $len = $COL3 - $COL2 $item.sector = $sorted.item -> get sector $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL2 length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$item.sector $text.columns[2] = $text
$ware.amt = $sorted.item -> get amount of ware $details.ware in cargo bay $ware.max = $sorted.item -> get max amount of ware $details.ware that can be stored in cargo bay $ware.per = fixed multiply and divide: $ware.amt * 100 / $ware.max $text = create custom menu string progress: width=$COL.LEN progress=$ware.per% $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COL.LEN right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[3] = $text
$text = convert number $ware.amt to string $text2 = convert number $ware.max to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s/%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COL.LEN right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[4] = $text
$context.menu = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Encyclopedia] id=76 add context menu entry: menu=$context.menu, text=$read.text, icon=29, returnvalue='info', hotkey=[Key.Identity], disabled=[FALSE] $text = $sorted.item -> get name add context menu global info line: menu=$context.menu, name=$filter.class, value=$text $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id=$sorted.item, menu=$context.menu, dynamic=[FALSE] $ret = create menu return value: object context menu, object=$sorted.item
add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.columns returnvalue=$ret end
if $drawn.any add end grouping to menu: $menu add section to custom menu: $menu end endsub return null
